HomeTitle: RAL Colors - HEX, RGB & CMYK Codes
MetaDescription: Explore RAL colors with HEX, RGB & CMYK codes, conversion tools, and side-by-side comparisons. Browse RAL Classic, Design System Plus, and Effect colors.
WelcomeBody: Browse 2,500+ RAL colors with accurate HEX, RGB, and CMYK codes. Compare colors side by side, convert between formats, and find the perfect shade for your project.
AllColorsDesc: Browse the complete collection of RAL Classic, Design System Plus, and Effect colors.
RalClassicDesc: The original 216 RAL colors used worldwide in industry and trade.
RalDesignPlusDesc: 1,825 colors systematically arranged for architects and designers.
RalEffectDesc: 490 metallic and solid colors for special coating effects.
ConverterDesc: Convert RAL colors to HEX, RGB, HSL, and CMYK formats.
CompareDesc: Compare up to 8 RAL colors side by side on different backgrounds.
PickerDesc: Upload an image and identify the closest matching RAL colors.
